text: Marchaux-Chaudefontaine is a commune in the department of Doubs, eastern France. The municipality was established on 1 January 2018. It merged the two communes of Marchaux (the seat) and Chaudefontaine.Arrêté préfectoral 4 December 2017 == Related pages == *Communes of the Doubs department == References == Category:Communes in Doubs Category:2018 establishments in France
title: Marchaux-Chaudefontaine
